main event: A witness observed a round, glowing orange object hovering above the ground in Hutchinson, Kansas on 8 July 1962.
interesting points: The object was about 10-12 feet in diameter and glowed orange,It hovered for approximately 3-5 minutes before moving rapidly away,The object accelerated quickly and disappeared in a matter of seconds,No sound was reported during the sighting,The sighting was confirmed by a mature and reliable witness, and reported to the USAF.
witness description: a mature and reliable witness residing in Hutchinson, Kansas
